body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Sarah Robinson from AutoPro Car Dealership. How can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. Can I have your phone number starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - six seven eight - nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can you also provide me with your email address for communication purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is john.smith@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, John. We will use it to assist you further. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have some concerns about the product quality of the car I purchased from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, John. Let's address your concerns. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will do our best to resolve the issue. Thank you for your time today, John. Have a great day.
